title: Michael Cheika questions Eddie Jones' decision to invite Australian rugby league coach into England camp
text:
Wallabies head coach Michael Cheika has questioned Eddie Jones’ decision to invite Australian rugby league coach Ricky Stuart into the England camp just days before their World Cup quarter-final clash.

Stuart, a close friend of Cheika’s, flew into England’s training camp in Miyazaki on Thursday having just guided the Canberra Raiders to the NRL Grand Final. Jones, the England head coach, hopes that Stuart will offer a fresh perspective as they fine-tune their preparations for their last-eight match against Australia.

Yet citing his own friendship with England football coach Gareth Southgate, Cheika suggested that bringing an outsider into their camp at such a crucial juncture could unsettle...
description: Wallabies head coach Michael Cheika has questioned Eddie Jones’ decision to invite Australian rugby league coach Ricky Stuart into the England camp just days before their World Cup quarter-final clash.
